  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdventurePhase
    Represents the Adventure Phase of the game where each player draws and resolves an AdventureCard.
    AdventureState
    Abstract class representing a state in the AdventurePhase of the game.
    BuildingPhaseLv2
    Represents the second level of the building phase in the game.
    BuildingPhaseTrial
    Represents a simplified trial version of the building phase in the game.
    CheckPhase
    Represents the Check Phase of the game, where all player ship boards are validated after the building phase.
    EndGamePhase
    Represents the Endgame Phase of the game.
    GamePhase
    Abstract class representing a generic phase of the game.
    IdlePhase
    Represents the initial phase of the game, where players can join the lobby and choose their colors.
    IdleState
    Represents the initial state of the AdventurePhase, in which no player is currently resolving an adventure card.
    SelectAlienUnitState
    Represents the state within the AdventurePhase where each player selects an AlienUnit and places it into a HousingUnit on their ShipBoard.
